job_title: Buyer / Buying Manager – Luxury Consumer Lifestyle Group
description:
Company Description

Our client is a leading luxury lifestyle retailer with a large amount of retail POS in Hong Kong. Due to upcoming expansion planning, they are planning to expand their product portfolio. They have reserved a huge amount of budget for the upcoming aggressive expansion. Therefore, they are looking for Buyer/Assistant Buyer to join their expanding Buying team.

Responsibilities

Act as the lead buyer to manage the overall category product assortment and product portfolio.
Identify potential suppliers to source new products to enhance the product portfolio.
Manage merchandising mix and promotion campaigns for both existing and new products for stores in different locations.
Negotiate with suppliers to achieve competitive prices and terms.
Work with retail operation team to identity hero products and slow moving stocks to improve the replenishment plan for upcoming promotion activities.
Conduct sales forecast and analysis in order to develop the pricing strategies and buying category.

Requirements

Degree in Business Administration or related discipline.
5- 10 years buying/ category management experience in luxury brands, experience within lifestyle would be an added bonus.
Open candidate from luxury fashion brand to apply too.
Good command in spoken and written English and Chinese.
Less experience will be considered as a Assistant Buyer.

Interested parties please send your updated resume in WORD format with current and expected salaries (quoting Employer Ref:)
selling_points: Exposure To New Buy Category, Career Development.
Welcoming Candidates from Luxury Fashion Masion
Young Working Environment With High Autonomy.
